metadata.title: sharedway
metadata.description: sharedway is a website that helps connect lost people and animals with their loved ones. Help spread the word

hero.title: Help find those we love most
hero.slogan: Helping those we meet along the way, this is our shared way

features.community-description: We are here thanks to those who help us, thanks to the community and for the community we are here to help others as much as we can. Improving every day.
features.code-description: Our code is entirely available and open for changes, be part of it and help build a better world through our git repository.
features.partners-description: Our partners allow us to go further, thanks to partnerships we were able to distribute the code so that it could reach everyone who needed it.

about.title: About
about.description: We are an open source software (OSS) project that helps connect those who have disappeared with their friends and family. With a public API and free access, our mission is to centralize and distribute information to wherever it is needed.

callback.title: Setting up your account
callback.description: In the meantime, we would like to say that everything is going to be okay
callback.done: Settings done! You can return to using the app now

report.title: Report
report.subtitle: If this profile is violating any clause of our privacy policy, you can report it here.

profiles.already_reported: You have already reported this profile

unauth.title: Has someone important disappeared?
unauth.description: We are here to help, you can register the disappearance by creating an account or sending a message to our official Instagram:

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Other ways to get in touch

errors.file-too-large: The uploaded file "{name}" is larger than {size}mb
errors.too-many-files: Too many files were loaded at once
